SHIPPING & RETURNS
We offer free shipping on all domestic orders. We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. Youâ€™ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

Shipping typically takes around 2-3 business days after your order has been processed. After you place an order, you will receive a shipping confirmation email with tracking information. If you have any issues, please email us at contact@hairactive.co.

If your product was damaged during shipping or you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us at contact@hairactive.co.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE
Gray No More works best on those who have 0-30% grey. Not sure what percentage you are?

If you have consistently used Hair Active products for more than 3 months and have not seen results, please email us at contact@hairactive.co so that we can understand more about your hair and lifestyle. We will issue a full refund if you are not satisfied with your results contact@hairactive.co
